oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Texture and grain refinement in equal channel angular pressing using round corner dies
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PADHYE, RS
MILIND, TR
DATE, PP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pure aluminum
extrusion
equal channel angular pressing
grain refinement
texture
microstructure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper attempts to experimentally analyze the evolution of microstructure and texture for Equal Channel Angular Pressing (ECAP) for a single pass while processing materials with varying starting grain sizes. Results indicate that grain refinement in such cases is sensitive to initial grain size of the material and no significant change in texture is noticed in a single pass.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ADVANCES IN MATERIALS AND PROCESSING TECHNOLOGIES, PTS ONE AND TWO,1315,536-541
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Conference on Advances in Materials and Processing Technologies,Paris, FRANCE,OCT 24-27, 2010
